LanguageData.AvaliBasicTurret.label: Avali turret
LanguageData.AvaliBasicTurret.description: A lightweight railgun turret, designed for long range combat. It is somewhat less durrable than its human-built counterparts, but has great long range accuracy.

LanguageData.AvaliBasicTurretGun.label: Basic avali turret gun
